Class DataTableStreamScan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.table.source.AbstractDataTableScan
      • org.apache.paimon.table.source.DataTableStreamScan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataTableScan, InnerTableScan, StreamDataTableScan, StreamTableScan, TableScan, Restorable<Long>

    public class DataTableStreamScan
extends AbstractDataTableScan
implements StreamDataTableScan
    StreamTableScan implementation for streaming planning.
